channel.title: AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)
channel.description: Recent content in AIoT Group on Jianfei Yang (Rocky)

item.title: Group
item.description: I am interesed to supervise or collaborate the following research topics: Deep learning empowered AIoT sensing Transfer learning for data-efficient sensing Multimodal LLM for IoT The students are expected to have solid backgrounds on machine learning, deep learning and [wireless sensing]. Please contact me if you are interested. Ph.D. Students Qian Hanjie (AI-aided Structural Health Monitoring) Huang He (WiFi-based Sensing and Localization) Cao Haozhi (Domain Adaptation for Multimodal Semantic Segmentation) Chen Siyu (Graph Learning for Mobile Computing) MSc Research Projects Huang Shunyu - Graph Transfer Learning for Cross-Modal Supervision Wang Junfei - Federated Learning with Blockchains Alumni (PhD) PhD Dr.
